events.message: Customer called to file a claim after their vehicle was involved in a collision at an intersection yesterday evening.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to damage sustained by the car in the reported collision.
An agent was assigned promptly to handle the auto accident claim and assist the customer throughout the process.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claimant's report and confirmed the next steps to be taken.
Requested all relevant documents including police report, car repair estimate, and photographs of the accident.
Customer submitted the police report, repair estimates, and pictures of the vehicle damage as requested.
The claims department began investigating the circumstances of the auto accident and verifying vehicle damages.
Investigation concluded confirming the claim details and validating the damages sustained by the vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the repair estimates and policy coverage.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the responsiveness of the claims team.
The claim was approved after the customer accepted the settlement offer for the vehicle repairs.
Payment was issued to the customer for the approved amount covering the car repair expenses.
The auto accident claim was officially closed following issuance of payment and resolution of all issues.
All claim documents and files were archived in the system for future reference and compliance.
